body_html:
Those failed are due to unavailability of infiniband/verbs.h. But I do see the following line, meaning verbs is not turned on. I am looking into it.

"No VERBS support will be enabled for TensorFlow"

body:
Those failed are due to unavailability of infiniband/verbs.h. But I do see the following line, meaning verbs is not turned on. I am looking into it.

"No VERBS support will be enabled for TensorFlow"
